testimonials.text:
It's been great to work with Sumit. 
 He is well organized and work in planned manner which gives his work a sense of responsibility and perfection. 
 Good luck !
testimonials.user: Rupa Kumari (AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner, Software Analyst @ Principal Financials Group)

testimonials.text:
Me and Sumit worked for approximately 2 years. 
 He is self motivated person and always focus on not only problem solving, but also finding problems. 
 He has been also a good mentor to junior folks in team and help them quicker on boarding. 
 Condensing his abilities to embrace the challenge irrespective or the technology stack known or unknown. 
He is a superb backend engineer along with some good to have front end technologies knowledge as ReactJS. 
Given an opportunity, I will always to work with Sumit again.

I've had the chance to work with Sumit for 2 years as a part of my AppDirect journey. 
He is a very skilled developer, in no time he developed in-depth domain knowledge for Marketplace core functionality working closely with the core team. 
 He has a very positive attitude towards work, sound knowledge of programming and possess good coding skills. He also participated in Hackathon 2 years in a row and won as well showing great intensity and innovation. 
 Also as a person he is very friendly, approachable and always ready to help junior folks in the team.
